plot outline: Newly married Sameer and Harshada are living happily until Sameer's childhood friend Damodar arrives.Damodar comes from a small village and Harshada doesn't like him due to his village habits.But she finds that he is simple and loving person and both develop a friendship which iris Sameer creating misunderstanding between him and Harshada.Damodar then decides to reunite the couple.
title: Doghat Tisra Aata Sagala Visara
akas: दोघाट तीसरा आता सगला विसरा (India, Hindi title)
plot: A newly married couples' lives are turned upside down when a childhood friend visits them unexpectedly.

Newly married Sameer and Harshada are living happily until Sameer's childhood friend Damodar arrives.Damodar comes from a small village and Harshada doesn't like him due to his village habits.But she finds that he is simple and loving person and both develop a friendship which iris Sameer creating misunderstanding between him and Harshada.Damodar then decides to reunite the couple.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
